mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT no, office_no, member_no, name, phone, payment, price, refund_amount, start_date, end_date, booking_date, reg_date FROM refund WHERE ${f} LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%' ORDER BY no ) m WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM refund WHERE ${f} LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%'

SELECT r.no AS refundNo, o.title AS officeTitle, r.name AS memberName, r.phone AS memberPhone, r.price AS price, r.refund_amount AS refundAmount, r.payment AS payment, r.booking_date AS bookingDate, r.reg_date AS refundDate FROM refund r JOIN office o ON r.office_no = o.no WHERE o.manager_no = #{no} ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM refund r JOIN office o ON r.office_no = o.no WHERE o.manager_no = #{no}
